page.title: 02BETTWS IFAN, DYFED
page.content: My name is {Arwen Eleri Evans}, I am 10 years with blue eyes & yellow hair I shall be 11 on 7 Nov 85. The name of my school is Glynarthen. I live in Bwlchyllon,{Bettws Ivan,}with my mum & dad & gran. My dad's name is{Evan {Garfield Lyn Evans}and my mum's name is{Elizabeth Anita Evans}. I have one dog a corgi called Siani. There are 13 rooms in my house. I keep my collections in my bedroom. I go to {Sunday School and Chapel}in Glynarthen My mum is the teacher. I have 2 friends at school Elen & Wendy. I am in S4 in school, I like doing History and Welsh best but I don't like doing arithmetic. When I work or read I have to wear glasses. My teacher is Miss Evans. My favourite programme is the {Late Late Breakfast Show & SOS Galw {Garc Tryfon.}Mum is a teacher in Llandysul, dad works in Carmarthen.
